definition: To cover or adorn oneself with garments, typically referring to the act of getting dressed or wearing clothes. This verb is commonly used to describe the action of putting on attire or dressing oneself in a particular manner.

examples.german: Sie kleidet ihr Baby warm ein.
Wir kleiden uns passend zur Jahreszeit.
